status.success: Success is the status for a completed order.
status.partial_success: Partial Success is the status for an order that is partially completed and partially failed.
status.pending: Pending is the status for an order that is being processed by our system.
status.failed: Failed is the status for an order that failed to be processed by our system.
status.refunded: Refunded is the status for an order that was canceled by us or by our system.
status.partial_refund: Partial Refund is the status for an order that was partially canceled by us or by our system.

faqPage.title: FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)
faqPage.description: If you have other questions, please contact us through our <contact>contact form</contact> or by contacting <whatsapp>customer service</whatsapp>.
faqPage.question_1: How do I check my order invoice and order status?
faqPage.answer_1: You can use the track order feature by entering the invoice number.
faqPage.question_2: What if I have a transaction problem?
faqPage.answer_2: You can contact us via WhatsApp or Email listed on our Website to get direct assistance from our customer support.
faqPage.question_3: Why hasn't my top-up product arrived and the transaction status is 'Refunded'?
faqPage.answer_3: Make sure to always double-check that the User ID you entered is correct. If the transaction is not successful, it may be due to a disruption from the game provider. You can contact us via WhatsApp or Email by providing the payment Invoice No. and the correct User ID for immediate assistance.
faqPage.question_4: Can Top Up purchases be canceled?
faqPage.answer_4: For Top Up purchases that are already in process with the provider or have been successful, they cannot be canceled or refunded. We provide refunds if the order cannot be completed according to the applicable provisions.
faqPage.question_5: What if my transaction status is 'Process'?
faqPage.answer_5: A 'Pending' status means the product will be automatically added after the payment is declared successful. However, if the transaction status is still 'Pending', please wait a few minutes and check the payment status periodically. If you still need further assistance, please contact our customer support via WhatsApp or Email by attaching a screenshot of the problematic page.
faqPage.question_6: What if I have questions other than the ones above?
faqPage.answer_6: Please contact our customer service via WhatsApp.
